Ability.Description: Charges an enemy dealing 694 to 767 Physical damage. Roots the enemy for 1.5s. Removes all movement impairing effects from the Warrior. This ability grants 1 Attack Point.

Ability.Description: Deals 1149 to 1270 Physical damage to an enemy. Must be used after the target or the Warlord Blocks or Dodges an attack.

Ability.Description:
Increases Armor by 15%, and Resistances by 20%. Reduces damage dealt by 10%. Lasts for a duration based on Attack Points:

Rank.Description: Unlocks the King of the Hill ability.
Reduces the Power cost of Piercing Thrust, Wave of Steel, and all attacks that must follow a Block or Dodge by 2. Increases the healing of Recovery Posture by 10%.
Reduces the Power cost of Piercing Thrust, Wave of Steel, and all attacks that must follow a Block or Dodge by 4. Increases the healing of Recovery Posture by 20%.
Charge abilities refresh Defensive Maneuver, Sergeant's Order and Battlefield Medic.
King of the Hill increases the damage of Piercing Thrust and Wave of Steel by 10% for 15 seconds, and increases the critical hit chance of the next Piercing Thrust or Wave of Steel by 50%.
King of the Hill increases the damage of Piercing Thrust and Wave of Steel by 25% for 15 seconds, and increases the critical hit chance of the next Piercing Thrust or Wave of Steel by 100%.

Ability.Description: 15% of the damage done to a single ally is redirected to the Warlord. Lasts 1h.
